review:
Dr Nirmala is very friendly and very thorough. Proper care and procedure provided at a time when you need it most. 
She is thorough in her examinations and her diagnosis And even followed up with an email to check in when we moved out from Bangalore. Would not hesitate in recommending her.

DR. Nirmala is very friendly and nice doctor i have ever experienced, she explained us about all the procedures and issues. All the dr in the hospital are kind and generous. 

I recommend anyone facing gynaec  issues  do visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: We were trying for baby from past 6months with pcos. We consulted doctor Nirmal Mohan. She started fertility treatment. She nicely explained about fertility steps. She is very friendly and experienced doctor.We started fertility medicines and injections. We got bfp.
